data.text:
@MarjaToivioKaas We accept the following coronavirus tests: 
PCR-test taken maximum 72 hours before the flight’s departure 
LAMP-test taken maximum 72 hours before the flight’s departure 
Antigen test taken maximum 48 hours before the flight’s departure

From 28.1., we’ll require a certificate of a negative coronavirus test from customers arriving in Finland. It can be either printed or digital. The requirement does not apply to children under 12. Read more details about the updated guidance. https://t.co/L8txW6uPCe

@lvuorela @merjah @yleuutiset Hei, ilmoitimme jo viime viikolla, että Suomeen saapuvilta matkustajilta vaaditaan negatiivinen testitodistus tai todistus aiemmin sairastetusta koronainfektiosta. Lisätietoa: https://t.co/AJlphHtzMp Heidi / Finnair
@nikize0 Hi, this requirement does not concern you if you connect to an international flight at Helsinki. You can find more information from the link.//Roosa
@tzmarnold Hi, this kind of text message is not enough. From here you can see what the certificate has to contain https://t.co/L8txW6uPCe //Roosa
@SiniSuom Hi Sini, yes it does.//Roosa
@GymSwedeAnto Hi Anton, this also applies passengers from Sweden. //Roosa
@LifeCheapSeats Hi, I'm sorry to say, but it's not possible with our flights.//Roosa
@macsinalba Hi, information that we have at the moment is that flights should start again 30th January.//Roosa

data.text: We will require a negative covid-19 test certificate of all passengers on all Finnair flights to Finland from Jan 28 onwards. We will also re-start passenger flights from the UK and Ireland to Finland as of Jan 25. Pls read more: https://t.co/L8txW6uPCe

data.text: Did you know that Finland’s language is one of the hardest in the world to learn for English speakers? But the good news is there are shortcuts. https://t.co/WK5fLnfkeS
@rhirbel Hi, thank you for your feedback! 😊 Have a good day! //Jukka-Pekka

@jannemkilpinen Seuraamme matkustusohjeiden ja kysynnän kehitystä tälläkin reitillä. Kaikki Hki-Vantaalle tulevat ohjataan koronatestiin. Meillä on jo juna-lento-yhteistyö Allegron kanssa mutta Allegro on nyt ollut koronatauolla. Lento- ja junaliikenteen yhdistämisessä on paljon mahdollisuuksia.

"Almost 80 per cent of Finland’s land is forest; its lakes are among the clearest and its air the cleanest in the world."
https://t.co/PTYFjPTqNG
@FrQV0KSUUvowVEi Hi, cargo-only flights or ferry flights, i.e. without passengers. /Mari

We will operate to the UK as follows: AY1337 HEL-LHR on 16.1., 17.1., 18.1., 23.1. and 24.1., and AY1331 HEL-LHR on 16.1., 17.1. and 23.1. We will operate AY1365 (HEL-MAN) and AY1373 (HEL-EDI) on 16.1. and 23.1. The return flights to HEL are operated as transfer flights.

Traficom has suspended passenger flights from the UK and Ireland to Finland until Jan 25 at 9:59 UTC. We are contacting customers whose flights are affected. Please see our Flight Information: https://t.co/wV8Hn0Ejxe

@papa_K_burgundy Hi, according to our current information the flight will be operated as planned. The passengers will be informed if there are any changes. /Elli

data.text: Let it snow! ❄️ We are keeping our traffic operating at HEL airport, despite the slight snow challenges – OH-LWM will head to HKG tomorrow. This picture also shows why some of our aircraft are in long-term parking in warmer climates. https://t.co/1h9zhr48MB

@AlbanAltiparmak Bonjour Altiparmak Alban,

Veuillez nous écrire par message privé pour qu'on puisse investiguer ce qui s'est produit.

Dans l'attente de votre message privé.

Cordialement
@HelenHolton4 Hi, if you still need help with this, please DM us your booking reference, travel dates and e-mail address on the booking so we can check this. /Elli
@heatherambrosia Nämä tiedot on aina hyvä varmistaa kohdemaan viranomaisilta, esimerkiksi Ison-Britannian konsulaatista tai rajaviranomaisilta, koska tieto on siellä ajan tasalla varmemmin. /Elli
@Nicodemuz Hi, we now start with intra-Europe flights and keep long-haul fare structures as before. /Mari

data.text: @JMartinResearch Hi! Could you please send your booking details to us by DM so we can check. //Jukka-Pekka
Finnair introduces one-way ticket fares for its flights within Europe. https://t.co/pftskwIkyN

@A_Contursi Bonjour Monsieur Contursi,

Je vous prie de nous contacter par un message privé, pour qu'on puisse investiguer la situation avec votre reservation, et quel est le statut dans notre systheme.

Dans l'attente de votre message privé.

Finnair

We’ll operate the HEL-DUB-HEL flights AY1385 and AY1386 as normal on 9.1. We’ll also operate the following flights from HEL to the British Isles: AY1337 HEL-LHR 11.1., 13.1., 16.1. ja 17.1. and AY1331 HEL-LHR 17.1.
AY1373 HEL-EDI 16.1.
AY1365 HEL-MAN 16.1.

Traficom is continuing the suspension of passenger flights from the UK and also suspending passenger flights from Ireland and South Africa to Finland 11.-18.1.2021. We'll be in direct contact with customers whose flights are impacted.

urls.title: Feedback and compensation
urls.description: We are currently experiencing backlog in our customer service. We are sorry for the delay in replying to your feedback. Thank you for your patience! We appreciate your feedback and are here to assist you with your claims and other concerns. Your feedback is valuable to us in developing our services further. For more general topics, please check our frequently asked questions, or get assistance from our chat service at any

data.text: @zjyhui Hi! I apologize for the bad experience. If you wish to give feedback, you can do it on our website: https://t.co/euSwhx7KJA. I can also forward your feedback to our CR team if you tell more as a DM and inform your booking reference code and e-mail address. -Sara
@CiceroBlog Hi, could you please send private message (DM) with your booking reference or ticket number as well as the email and phone number on the booking, so we can take a look?  -Toni
@opodo Bonjour! On n'a rien trouve dans notre boite email de votre part. Notre boite email est reservation.fr@finnair.com

data.text: We’ll operate the following UK flights: on 4-10 Jan AY1337 HEL-LHR daily, morning flight AY1331 HEL-LHR on 8 and 10 Jan. We’ll also operate flights AY1365 to MAN and AY1373 to EDI on 2 and 9 Jan. Return flights to HEL are cargo or ferry flights. https://t.co/Sti2frxk6i
@otsokarhu Yes, we will continue to operate some of our flights from Finland to the UK. We'll contact customers on the affected flights directly via text or email. Heidi / Finnair

Suspension of passenger flights from the UK to Finland will continue until 11 January. We are cancelling our flights from the UK to Finland for that time. We’ll continue to operate some of our flights from Finland to the UK. https://t.co/B9Dy2HVUuB

data.text: Happy New Year! Thank you for the past year and all the positive messages during these challenging times. We hope that in 2021 we will be able to bring the world closer to you again. May the year ahead be full of seeing loved ones and having new experiences. 💙 https://t.co/ah90gmIUUC

@eekielner Unfortunately it's not possible to upgrade travel class with BA avios on our bookings. If you need further assistance, please DM us your booking reference, travel dates and e-mail address. /Elli

urls.title: Travel updates
urls.description: Helsinki Airport is the ideal place to start and finish your journey. All flights depart from and arrive in one terminal. We currently have delays in the refund handling due to a higher than normally volume of refund applications. Finnair leases an A320 aircraft from DAT LT from 20 June to 29 October 2022. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. We collected tips for you for smooth travelling during the busy summer season.

data.text: @bentonm Sorry to hear that! You need an internet connection that enables you to watch videos with good quality. A 25 Mbps or a 4G connection should be enough. The browser should be Chrome, Firefox, Safari or Edge. Heidi / Finnair
@JaimeAbad9 Hi! Please send us DM so I can take a look if there is something I can do. /Sari
@DiPhillips77 Hi! Please send us DM if there is still something I can help you with. /Sari
@pinkdivingchick Hi, I see that your problem has already been resolved through our customer service. /Sari
@jenweatherhead Hi! I have answered your DM. /Sari
@Richard21_32 Apologies if the phone call didn't go smoothly. Please DM us your booking reference and e-mail address on the booking so we can have a look on how to proceed with this. /Elli

data.text: Merry Christmas from Santa's official airline! Finnair has been Santa's trustworthy travel partner for nearly 40 years, helping this world traveller fulfil his mission since 1983. Learn more about our partnership here: https://t.co/DnlOrL132x https://t.co/C5yV4TMr6I

data.text:
RT @Artemus_Finch: Great initiative @Finnair ! Let us be #SantasRedHelpers 
#visitrovaniemi #ChristmasIsON #UNICEF #virtualtourism https://…

According to the current plan, we will operate flight AY1337 HEL-LHR on 23.12., 26.12., 27.12., 28.12., 30.12., 2.1. and 3.1. We will also operate flights AY1365 HEL-MAN and AY1373 HEL-EDI on 26.12. and 2.1. The return flights back to HEL will be cargo or ferry flights only.

@countertenorist @finlandinuk @MagicaLPrimuS @TraficomFinland @THLorg Mahdolliset kotiutuslennot ovat viranomaisvetoisia, eli viranomaiset tekevät niistä päätökset ja kontaktoivat sitten lentoyhtiöitä. Heidi / Finnair
@CarmonaTanz We will operate some flights from HEL to LHR in the next two weeks. We aim to make decisions on them today. Heidi / Finnair

@lindiep We apologize for the lack of information. The situation is difficult for us too and we are continually trying to find alternative flights for passengers. I am glad to hear that you got suitable rerouting from our customer service. -Sara
@twix6 Lennämme joitain HEL-LHR-lentoja tulevien kahden viikon ajan, päätökset lennettävistä lennoista pyritään tekemään tänään. Heidi / Finnair

@countertenorist @THLorg Ymmärrämme, että tämä aiheuttaa huolta asiakkaillemme. Pyrimme mahdollisuuksien mukaan reitittämään asiakkaita uudelleen, mutta se voi olla haastavaa, koska niin monet maat ja lentoyhtiöt ovat lopettaneet Britannian lentonsa. Lisätietoa vaihtoehdoista: https://t.co/m830ZDp61I
@SuviRin @yleuutiset Voit hakea takaisinmaksua käyttämättömästä lentolipusta tai sen osasta varaukseni-palvelun kautta. EU:n vakiokorvaus on eri asia kuin lipun hinnan takaisinmaksu. Heidi / Finnair

data.text: @lindiep Hi Linda! I am sorry for the flight cancellation. If you wish to give feedback about this situation, you may do it on our website: https://t.co/euSwhx7KJA. -Sara
@LucyJam Hi, we will operate some flights from HEL to LHR in the next two weeks. We aim to make decisions on them today. Heidi / Finnair

@JamieNeale5 Sorry to hear about your situation! We will contact you about your options via text/email, so please make sure we have your contact details: https://t.co/VtYakOuL56. You have the option to reschedule your flight. Heidi / Finnair
@katrilassinen We will operate some flights from HEL to LHR in the next two weeks. We aim to make decisions on them today. Heidi / Finnair
We are in direct contact with customers about the cancelled flights. We will operate some flights from HEL to LHR in the next two weeks. We aim to make decisions on them today.

We will cancel flights from the UK to Helsinki between 21.12.2020–4.1.2021 due to restrictions set by Traficom. We will operate flight AY1337 from Helsinki to London today so that our customers who are currently in Helsinki will get to go home.
@Powellinho86 Please DM us your booking reference, travel dates, name and e-mail address on the booking so we can have a look at this and help you out :) /Elli
